entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
Aeroflot has updated rules and procedures for transporting animals. The new regulations are aimed to ensure safety and comfort of all passengers on board. 
Further information for passengers travelling with pets can be found at https://t.co/9CDWa9QFUq https://t.co/xnLu5kluOg

Seychelles are created for rest and relaxation under the swaying palms on tropical paradise beaches. 
Aeroflot has increased the number of flights to Seychelles to four weekly #SayYesToSeychelles https://t.co/hHNHKaa6s7
Happy Russia Day! #Aeroflot https://t.co/Od00f79a0e

Aeroflot has 139 representative offices across Russia and abroad, including 82 overseas offices. 
This year celebrates 5 years of the airline’s department administering this extensive corporate network. https://t.co/hfaHLiCObV

As a token of gratitude to our loyal customers Aeroflot has extended the elite level status for members of our Aeroflot Bonus frequent flyer programme. https://t.co/bLD7zn0ElD  #AeroflotBonus https://t.co/w3Ktkwh0uM
Aeroflot announces Q1 2021 IFRS financial results https://t.co/lbINLG1lui

Today marks the long-awaited opening of Aeroflot’s international hub at Krasnoyarsk D.A. Hvorostovsky International Airport. On 1 June 2021, Aeroflot will launch regular flights programme from the heart of Siberia. https://t.co/Skb1kGHIrE https://t.co/RPuymlIe4k
Aeroflot signs its first sustainability-linked loan agreement https://t.co/3fEqKxjLfw

Aeroflot took delivery of its first Airbus A320neo. The latest addition to the fleet brings greater efficiencies and a new level of comfort for passengers. Further details at https://t.co/E6rfE3iXEd  #Aeroflot https://t.co/MgtC5EETe3
Aeroflot Group Announces Operating Results for April 2021 https://t.co/ZkERrlHU5j
Aeroflot becomes first Russian operator to benefit from Airbus and NAVBLUE advanced technology to enhance flight safety https://t.co/SKhcPCsXCF
Aeroflot becomes the official carrier of St.Petersburg International Economic Forum 2021 https://t.co/fiAHQA24au
Aeroflot launches an extensive programme to support mass vaccination campaign - “Miles for Vaccination”  https://t.co/8HnTCsOHKa #Aeroflot #IChoosetoVaccinate https://t.co/y6W3N1gHW9

Congratulations on the Great Victory Day!
We owe an eternal debt of gratitude to the defenders of our Motherland, and pay tribute to their heroism. #Aeroflot #VictoryDay https://t.co/2KYRZCg9pW
Expert RA assigns Aeroflot a rating of ruAA-, outlook Stable https://t.co/Gff1wSm1CU
Aeroflot Group Announces Operating Results for March 2021 https://t.co/HSjrJ6a1mf

Cappadocia, Turkey is famous for floating hot air balloons, sunset views over canyons, underground cities, and surreal landscapes. Book your transfer on Aeroflot website to make your journey hassle-free https://t.co/EFk1BbP2y8 https://t.co/JjmRn8Tnl3

Aeroflot’s own canine service has now 69 dogs of the Shalaika breed. They have an acute sense of smell and can detect dangerous substances. 
On Aeroflot’s initiative, the experts have begun to train the dogs to detect people infected with the coronavirus.
#Aeroflot #Shalaika https://t.co/gFn1CM1RIH

data.text:
Part of our airline’s history, Aeroflot Team was a unique female crew flying the long-haul airliner Il-62. In 1977, these six courageous and confident women set their sixth world record operating a 13-hour flight from Sofia to Vladivostok without landing. 
#Aeroflot #tbt https://t.co/YtnJP1nBhF
